d_0_0.line: Hey! You there! You gotta help me!

d_0_1.line: I was building my sandcastle the other day and I took my lucky pearl with me when I went to go get more sand and now I can't find it anywhere... I CAN'T LIVE WITHOUT IT!!!

d_0_2.line: I won't let ANYONE leave the beach until it's found!

d_0_5.line: Do you mind just getting it for me? I'll let you go in the forest. Plus it's too awkward if I just go to Lost and Found now, I screamed at everyone for hours...

choices.line: Well did you try Lost and Found?
